name: Multiplayer Snake
description:
NOTE: Although this game supports up to 6 inputs only 4 may be used at once

Multiplayer Snake is as it is called, a snake game where the aim is to cut off the other players by increasing your tail length and cutting off your enemies.

KEYBOARD CONTROLS Player 1:

Up/Down/Left/Right: WASD

Select/Change Color: Enter

Start: Space

Back: Backspace

Player 2:

Up/Down/Left/Right: Arrow Keys

Select/Change Color: Right Control

Start: Right Shift

Back: Delete

PS4 CONTROLS

Up/Down/Left/Right: D-Pad(Arrows)

Select/Change Color: X

Start: Options

Back: Circle

XBOX Controls

Up/Down/Left/Right: D-Pad(Arrows)

Select/Change Color: A

Start: Start

Back: B
